title: That the City Council meeting minutes of February 5, 2024 be approved.

That Report LSOCS24-003 – Municipal Act Provisions, Report FCSFS24-004 – Home Energy Efficiency Program (HEEP) Update, Report IPGACP24-001 – 2023 Asset Management Planning Update, Report IPGENG24-001 – Enbridge Gas Distribution Inc. Model Franchise Agreement, Report CSFS24-001 – Fire Dispatch Services for Townships within Peterborough County, Report IPGPL24-001, Zoning By-law Amendment for 950 Lansdowne Street West, and Report IPGENG24-002 – Traffic Calming Permanent Installations be approved on Consent.

That Council approve the recommendations outlined in Report IPGPL24-002, dated February 20, 2024 of the Commissioner, Infrastructure, Planning and Growth Management (Acting) as follows: a) That Section 3.9, Exceptions of Zoning By-law 1997-123 be amended by adding Exception Number 363 to prescribe site-specific regulations for the properties known as 1119 and 1123 Water Street in accordance with the Draft Zoning By-law Amendment attached as Exhibit D of Report IPGPL24-002; and b) That the subject properties be rezoned from C.2 – Commercial District and SP.136 – Commercial District respectively to R.6-363 – Residential District in accordance with the Draft Zoning By-law Amendment attached as Exhibit D of Report IPGPL24-002.

Lesley Parnell, Vice-Chair of Fire Services Keith Riel, Chair of Housing Alex Bierk, Vice-Chair of Housing Keith Riel, Chair of Homelessness Alex Bierk, Vice-Chair of Homelessness Kevin Duguay, Chair of Development and Construction Lesley Parnell, Vice-Chair of Development and Construction Lesley Parnell, Chair of Planning Keith Riel, Vice-Chair of Planning Dave Haacke, Chair of Public Works Dave Haacke, Chair of Seniors Matt Crowley, Chair of Social Services Keith Riel, Chair of Transportation Gary Baldwin, Chair of Waste Management Lesley Parnell, Chair of Youth

That by-law 24-017, Being a by-law to establish Portfolio Chairs and to delegate authority related thereto, be adopted.
24-018 Being a By-law to confirm the proceedings of the Council at its meeting held on February 26, 2024.
That this meeting be adjourned at 8:10 p.m.
